title: FS: Willis, Young and AB, EPDG backs
author: rocarroll

posts.post_title: FS: Willis, Young and AB, EPDG backs
posts.post_content:
up for grabs. Paypal f/f $2 to ship: 

Vic Willis batting, sweet cap SGC 45.  Have no idea what they found wrong with this. Must have been under a microscope.  Gorgeous card, no creases sharp corners  SOLD

Brasher AB back SGC 20  $45 sale pending
Dygert AB back SGC 30 SOLD

Jack Bliss EPDG SGC 45.  Another beauty (lint on the holder in bottom left not actually on card).  $90 sale pending

Admiral Schlei EPDG. Great corners and color.  Beauty!  Should grade a 4 IMO.  Guaranteed not altered. SOLD

Young Piedmont.  Another beauty that should grade 4 IMO.  Really strong card and guaranteed not altered.  $34
Bump for price reduction on remaining cards
